frameset.edef: to become delighted by a song; to enjoy listening to music or a song

role.argrole: the one becoming delighted by listening to the song

example.parse: عزفت ومضات فنية استطرب معها الجمهور

role.argrole: the song or the music often used with مع

frameset.edef: to request a song from someone

example.parse: اسْتَطْرَبَ* فلانًا : سَأَلَهُ أَن يُطَرَّبَ ويُغَنِّي

role.argrole: the one singing or doing the performance
